name: Corstone-300: Cortex-M55+Ethos-U55
description: Cortex-M55 and Ethos-U55 functional model implementations based on Corstone-300 design for MPS3 board.

run.name: --data
run.description: Full file name for a custom model. Model must be in TensorFlow Lite format compiled with Vela.

run.name: ethosu.num_macs=
run.description: Arm Ethos-U55 configuration - the number represents MACs per cycle.
